titles.title: Recognizing the significance of the hundredth anniversary of the soda Cheerwine.
Recognizing the significance of the hundredth anniversary of the soda Cheerwine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: Recognizes the significance of the 100th anniversary of the soda Cheerwine and acknowledges its contribution to North Carolina's vibrant food culture and unique local character.
